title: [QUESTION] Performace issue with animated webp decoding (UWP)

comments.author: yaindrop
comments.body:
You may need to check out `src/android/SkAnimatedImage` which solves the problem that decoding a frame causes decoding all previous frames recursively. 

I'm not a user of SkiaSharp though, just passing by and see this issue.

comments.author: Echostorm44
comments.body: Having the same issue. Did you ever find a workaround to this?
